issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description: [MPMoviePlayerController|https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/MediaPlayer/Reference/MPMoviePlayerController_Class/] has been deprecated since iOS 9.0 we should replace it with [AVPlayerViewController|https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/AVFoundation/Reference/AVPlayerViewController_Class/] if running an iOS 9.0 device or higher.
fields.summary: iOS: Replace deprecated controller inside TI.Media.VideoPlayer
